channel.description:
># [color=Grey] The Widow [/color] > **Nuetral Killer** >Passive: Immune to death and occupation (no duh this is an NK, it needs staying power) > *Day Ability 1- (I have clue what to name this ability. Taking suggestions):The person you attack with any ability tonight will see your name, however their logs and class aren't shown to anybody and they die as if you were using Lethal Bite -1/2 uses Note: This is incredibly powerful as it basically gets rid of one class and their logs which can be very useful, but if there is a psychic around they can easily broadcast who the Widow is. > *Night Ability 1- Posionious Bite*: You attack a target, they die in 1 night and start seeing some words as gibberish and anything mentioning the widow increases the amount of gibbersh they see and that sentence mentioning the widow is now gibbersh NOTE: Broadcasts what the NK is, but then again you can figure out the NK by around D3 > *Night Ability 2- Lethal Bite*: You attack someone tonight, they die tonight-3 Uses NOTE: Meant if someone is too smart for their own good (*Cough* PKR *cough*)
LORE: Once a respected member of the King's court, this lady has fallen into madness after her husband's death and blames the court for his death. She now seeks revenge by eliminating the court
Comments I went for a sorta of a delayed killer that can kill quickly if necessary. Also for some reason I can't change the category, it's either not updating on my thread creator or god is smiting my forum account :P Change Log 1/22/18-Class created 1/24/18-Cleaned up the card

item.title: The Widow [Class Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
The Widow

Nuetral Killer
Passive: Immune to death and occupation (no duh this is an NK, it needs staying power)
*Day Ability 1- (I have clue what to name this ability. Taking suggestions):The person you attack with any ability tonight will see your name, however their logs and class aren’t shown to anybody and they die as if you were using Lethal Bite -1/2 uses
Note: This is incredibly powerful as it basically gets rid of one class and their logs which can be very useful, but if there is a psychic around they can easily broadcast who the Widow is.
Night Ability 1- Posionious Bite: You attack a target, they die in 1 night and start seeing some words as gibberish and anything mentioning the widow increases the amount of gibbersh they see and that sentence mentioning the widow is now gibbersh
NOTE: Broadcasts what the NK is, but then again you can figure out the NK by around D3
Night Ability 2- Lethal Bite: You attack someone tonight, they die tonight-3 Uses
NOTE: Meant if someone is too smart for their own good (Cough PKR cough)

LORE: Once a respected member of the King’s court, this lady has fallen into madness after her husband’s death and blames the court for his death. She now seeks revenge by eliminating the court

Comments
I went for a sorta of a delayed killer that can kill quickly if necessary.
Also for some reason I can’t change the category, it’s either not updating on my thread creator or god is smiting my forum account
